participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.background: I work as a chef and love to come up with creative ways to use kale in my dishes. My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day. I enjoy writing poetry to express my emotions and cope with the challenges I've faced. I have only one child. I am in between classes.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.background: No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes. My family is very supportive of my writing. I am close to my family and we often listen to music together. I drove my van to a music festival and met a group of people who made me try new things. I am looking to start a business.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do?
I love to go to music festivals with my family.
That sounds really fun! I like to read poetry and write it.
I love to write poetry too! It's a great way to express yourself.
I agree! It's also a great way to cope with stress.
I can definitely relate to that. What kind of poetry do you write?
I write a lot of love poems and nature poems.
Those sound beautiful! I love reading love poems.
I recently went to a music festival and met a group of people who made me try new things.
That sounds like an amazing experience!
It was! I've never been to a music festival before and it was so much fun. I'm looking to start my own business soon.
That's great! What kind of business are you thinking of starting?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to start something new.
I'm sure you'll do great! You seem like a very creative person.
